Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Koma pamene iwo adzachiona chili nkudza pafupi, nkhope za anthu osakhulupirira zidzakhala za chisoni ndipo kudzanenedwa kuti: “Ichi ndi chimaliziro chimene munkafunsa kuti chidzafika liti?”
Nena: “Ndiuzeni! Kodi ngati Mulungu atandiononga ine pamodzi ndi iwo amene ali nane, ngakhale kuti Iye adzaonetsa chifundo pa ife, ndani amene angateteze anthu osakhulupirira ku chilango chowawa?”
Nena: “Iye ndi Mwini chifundo chosatha, mwa Iye ife timakhulupirira ndipo mwa Iye ife timaika chikhulupiriro chathu. Kotero inu mudzadziwa posachedwapa kuti ndani amene ali wochimwa.”
Nena: “Ndiuzeni! Kodi ngati madzi anu ataphwa, ndani amene angakupatseni inu madzi oyenda?”
Nun. Pali cholembera ndi zimene amalemba
Mwachisomo cha Ambuye wako, sindiwe wamisala ayi
Ndithudi iwe uli ndi makhalidwe abwino
Kuti ndani wa inu amene ndi wamisala
Ndithudi Ambuye wako amadziwa bwino amene wasochera ku njira yake ndipo amadziwa bwino amene amayenda m’njira yoyenera
Motero usatsatire zochita za anthu osakhulupirira
Iwo afuna utagwirizana nawo kuti nawonso agwirizane nawe
Ndipo usamvere zonena za munthu wotukwana amene alibe phindu
Woononga mbiri ya anzake ponena Al Qalam	613 za bodza
Woletsa ntchito zachilungamo, wophwanya malamulo ndi wochita zoipa
Chifukwa iye ali ndi chuma ndi ana
Pamene chivumbulutso chathu chilakatulidwa kwa iye, amati: “Ndi nkhani za anthu a makedzana.”
